trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESESX002_05243_SEQ_00<tab>Jihli Aliapoh is patiently waiting to see the parasol prototype. ※This quest is available for a limited time only.

TEXT_FESESX002_05243_SEQ_01<tab>Nonotta presents the prototype parasol to Jihli, who instantly expresses her approval. Having received the Dreamer's blessing, the Lalafell leaves to begin mass production. In the meantime, you agree to accompany a parasol-brandishing Jihli in search of potential Hatching<var 1F /var>tide celebrants. Speak with her in Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre when you are ready to embark.
※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

TEXT_FESESX002_05243_SEQ_02<tab>With Jihli in tow, you set off for the market, seeking out those who might wish to take part in the celebrations.
※You must be accompanied by Jihli to complete this task. Speak with her again should you become separated.

TEXT_FESESX002_05243_SEQ_03<tab>Among the hustle and bustle of the market, you encounter three individuals with a discerning eye for eggs. Each proves more than willing to gather at the amphitheatre when promised a parasol of their own, and will no doubt spread word of the exciting accessory on their way.

TEXT_FESESX002_05243_SEQ_04<tab>Satisfied at having found sufficient celebrants, Jihli stows her parasol for the time being. She shares her intention to return to the amphitheatre to see how many have gathered, and invites you to join her at your leisure.

TEXT_FESESX002_05243_SEQ_05<tab>You return to Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre to find a parasol-toting crowd gathered around the stage. As Jihli revels in the sight, Maisenta appears with the news that she, too, has been handing out parasols to those enamored with the ovoid accessories. Picturing delighted parasol bearers throughout the city, Nonotta suggests the scope of Jihli's vision has reached far beyond the amphitheatre, as it was perhaps always meant to do. Thrilled that the dream of myriad floating eggs has been fully realized, the pair repay your assistance with an Archon egg parasol of your very own. Duty done, you are free to enjoy the remainder of this year's Hatching<var 1F /var>tide!
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Jihli Aliapoh and have her accompany you.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_TODO_01<tab>Speak with potential Hatching<var 1F /var>tide celebrants while Jihli Aliapoh is accompanying you.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_TODO_02<tab>Accompany Jihli Aliapoh to the market entrance and then speak with her.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Jihli Aliapoh.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_000<tab>Nonotta will surely be along any moment now.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_NONOTTA_000_010<tab>Sorry to keep you both waiting! Allow me to present you with the very first Archon egg parasol!
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_011<tab>What a fine example of ingenuity. It's magnificent!
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_NONOTTA_000_012<tab>I'm so glad you approve! With your blessing, I'll begin producing more to distribute!
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_018<tab>In the meantime, we find ourselves at a loose end.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_019<tab>But we cannot let Nonotta outstrip us in Hatching<var 1F /var>tide spirit! There must be more we can do...
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_A1_000_000<tab>Let's show off your parasol to the townsfolk!
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_A1_000_001<tab>Perhaps we can drum up a crowd with the promise of gifts?

TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_020<tab>But of course! We ought to promote our newest addition to the festivities. If we tell even a few Gridanians that these gorgeous accoutrements will be available to those who celebrate with us, word will spread of its own accord!
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_030<tab>What's the matter, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? You seem to have taken a sudden, intense interest in my parasol.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_031<tab>Ah, that's it! What better way to draw celebrants than to show them this parasol─and promise them one of their very own?

TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_040<tab>With that in mind, I shall keep mine unfurled and on display. You use your adventurer's instincts to identify those most in need of egg-themed accessories.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_050<tab>The market is always busy. Let us look for potential celebrants there!
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>Jihli is now accompanying you. Keep her at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_SYSTEM_000_052<tab>You can leave Jihli behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with her and selecting the option to part ways.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>If you wish to have Jihli accompany you again, return and speak with her at the original location.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_SYSTEM_000_054<tab>While you are accompanied, you may encounter “conversation points” along the way which offer additional topics of discussion.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_SYSTEM_000_055<tab>Enter the glowing area and speak with your quest companions to initiate these bonus conversations. Enjoy exploring your surroundings together!
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_CHOICE1Q1_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_CHOICE1A1_000_000<tab>Speak with Jihli.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_CHOICE1A2_000_001<tab>Part ways with Jihli.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_CHOICE1A3_000_002<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_CHOICE1A4_000_003<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>Discuss the decorative basket.<var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_060<tab>When I think back to the very first Hatching<var 1F /var>tide, it's a marvel just how popular the occasion has become. I have so many people to thank for their efforts─yourself included!

TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_070<tab>We Dreamers are responsible for all the decorations you see throughout the city. Take that basket over there, for instance. I came up with the idea and Nonotta worked her magic to create the final product!
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_CHOICE2Q1_000_000<tab>Are you sure you wish to part ways with Jihli?

TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_080<tab>Ah, do you have some pressing business to attend to? Not to worry, I shall be waiting for you at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre. Seek me out once you are able!
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_090<tab>There you are! Let us be off!
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_CITIZENA05243_100_100<tab>I say, madam! You must tell me where I might acquire a resplendent parasol like unto your own.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_110_100<tab>At our Hatching<var 1F /var>tide event, of course! How about it? Will you join us at the amphitheatre?

TEXT_FESESX002_05243_CITIZENA05243_000_100<tab>I'd be delighted. As a true connoisseur of eggs both decorative and edible, I attend annually in hopes of glimpsing ovoid perfection, and this parasol surpasses my every imagining. Such elegance! Such egginess!

TEXT_FESESX002_05243_CITIZENB05243_100_110<tab>Why, that parasol is an absolute delight. It's not often you see that level of craftsmanship paired with such decorative flair. This might be the finest egg-inspired apparel I've ever seen! Might I ask who was responsible for this masterpiece?

TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_110_110<tab>The Leatherworkers' Guild, the Carpenters' Guild, Black Rabbit Traders, and our Dreamers all had their parts to play. And if you join us in celebrating Hatching<var 1F /var>tide, you can receive one just like it!

TEXT_FESESX002_05243_CITIZENB05243_000_110<tab>Ah, I should've known that the guilds' artisans were involved. If it means getting my hands on a parasol, I'd be more than happy to take part in the festivities!
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_CITIZENC05243_100_120<tab>Heavens above! Is that adorable parasol fashioned after an Archon egg!?
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_110_120<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Eggs<var 1A 01 /var>quisite, isn't it? If you join us at the amphitheatre, you will receive one just like it!

TEXT_FESESX002_05243_CITIZENC05243_000_120<tab>For years I have searched for a parasol as darling as an egg, getting sunburned and soaked by turns, and you offer me one free of charge! 'Tis a Hatching<var 1F /var>tide miracle!
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_130<tab>I expect those three will tell all and sundry about our parasols. Our work here is done!
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_CITIZENA05243_000_140<tab>This is fine work indeed, but my heart craves something more!
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_CITIZENB05243_000_141<tab>Outstanding quality...
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_CITIZENC05243_000_142<tab><sigh> If only I could find a cute little parasol...
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_SYSTEM_000_143<tab>You must be accompanied by Jihli and have her at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_SYSTEM_000_150<tab>Jihli has yet to arrive. Be sure she is at your side before attempting to continue.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_160<tab>Well, that went rather swimmingly. You clearly have an eye for egg connoisseurs!
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_161<tab>I shall go and see how many attendees are gathered at the amphitheatre. Feel free to join us when you have a moment.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_NONOTTA_000_171<tab>The folks you gathered certainly are enthusiastic about showing off their parasols! Fortunately, no one's yet lost an eye.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_180<tab>Look, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Isn't the sight of those parasols simply marvelous!?
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_181<tab>Eggs held aloft... Just as in my dream!
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_NONOTTA_000_182<tab>Hooray! We did it, Jihli!
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_183<tab>We certainly did. Shall we officially declare this Hatching<var 1F /var>tide a success?
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_MAISENTA_100_184<tab>(-???-)Hold that thought. You've yet to see the half of it.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_185<tab>Maisenta! I'm not quite sure I follow...

TEXT_FESESX002_05243_MAISENTA_100_185<tab>Quite a few of my customers asked about your parasols─more than can comfortably gather here, in fact. Nevertheless, I took the liberty of handing out stock to those who came inquiring.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_MAISENTA_110_185<tab>With how many left my stall with a smile on their face and a parasol in hand, the whole city is awash in floating eggs.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_186<tab>That's incredible! To think the parasols are bringing joy even beyond our celebration...
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_NONOTTA_100_187<tab>Wait, Jihli! They're one and the same, aren't they? The celebration has spread across the city, borne by a great mass of floating eggs!

TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_188<tab>Y-You're right! I was intent on gathering people here, but the eggs in my dream were far too numerous to contain in one place. They were always meant to be seen far and wide.

TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_100_188<tab>That our original plans met with misfortune was a blessing in disguise, for we've touched the hearts of more people than I'd dared to imagine. There's no doubt in my mind: this will go down as a Hatching<var 1F /var>tide to remember!

TEXT_FESESX002_05243_MAISENTA_110_189<tab>Black Rabbit Traders shall continue distributing parasols to those who ask─they may be free of charge, but they're drawing business in spades. Nonotta told me how to assemble them, so I can prepare as many as necessary.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_189<tab>Truly, where would we be without your ingenuity, Nonotta?
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_NONOTTA_000_190<tab>I couldn't have done it without our able adventurer! Ah, that reminds me. I have something for you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_NONOTTA_000_191<tab>That's the very second parasol I ever made─after Jihli's, of course. I thought it fitting that you receive it.

TEXT_FESESX002_05243_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_191<tab>With eggs aloft across the city, all that's left is to enjoy the festivities. Your work may have finished, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but Hatching<var 1F /var>tide most certainly hasn't!
TEXT_FESESX002_05243_SYSTEM_000_200<tab>You have unlocked the Egg Hunter Riggy mini-game. To play mini-games, open the toy chest found in any inn room.
